categories: Category:Hyperspace: The Official Star Wars Fan Club

nodes.text: Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon

Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon is a novella written by Joseph Bongiorno for the now defunct Hyperspace. The story, which itself spun out of an unpublished magazine article co-written by Rich Handley, was set to include Typhojem, the Left-Handed God, Tilotny's firstborn.
The novella was eventually published on October 31, 2018 on The Star Wars Expanded Universe Timeline.
